outline.ch: 本學期課程包含實作和專家講座探討「海廢」問題，已預計於10月13日舉辦戶外實作課程，另外預計於11月舉辦相關專題講座，講題內容為探討海洋垃圾，環保局根據統計，有近8成的海洋廢棄物來自陸地，幾乎都是人類活動中產生的，經過水系統最終流向海洋。為了守護海洋環境，本次的戶外實作，是跟「淨灘台灣淨灘顧地球Taiwan」合作帶學生前往竹圍海水浴場，進行淨灘活動，協助海灘及沿海步道進行垃圾清理。
outline.en: This semester‘s courses include practical exercises and expert lectures to discuss the issue of “marine debris“. An outdoor practical course is scheduled to be held on October 13, and a related special lecture is scheduled to be held in November. The topic of the lecture is to discuss marine debris. According to the Environmental Protection Bureau Statistics show that nearly 80％ of marine debris comes from land, almost all of which are generated by human activities and eventually flow into the ocean through water systems. In order to protect the marine environment, this outdoor practice is to cooperate with the “Beach Cleaning Taiwan“ to take students to Zhuwei Beach to conduct beach cleaning activities and assist in cleaning up garbage on the beach and coastal trails.

textbook.en: Slides of special speeches, introductions to city government activities, and sharing of implementation experience from partners

gradMethod.ch:
服務面：
個人反思歷程檔案(15％)，個人服務學習心得回饋
小組反思歷程檔案(15％)，小組服務學習成果分享
合作機構督導、師長滿意度或意見回饋(10％)
服務階段(或參與駐點)出席情形(20％)，參與說明會與現地服務工作出席狀況
學習面：
專業技能與觀念之強化成效(10％)，成果分享中之觀念是否增進
問題解決與團隊溝通情形(10％)，成果發表之小組分工狀況
學習階段或團體反思出席情形(20％)，出席成果發表會並參與發表
gradMethod.en:
Service side:
1.Personal reflection process file (15％): personal service learning experience feedback
2.Group reflection process files (15％): sharing of group service learning results
3.Supervision from partner institutions, teacher satisfaction or feedback (10％)
4.Attendance during the service stage (or participation in the station) (20％): attendance at briefing sessions and on-site service work
Learning side:
5.The effectiveness of strengthening professional skills and concepts (10％):whether the concepts in the sharing of results are improved
6.Problem solving and team communication (10％):group division of labor for results publication
7.Study stage or group reflection attendance (20％):attend the results presentation meeting and participate in the presentation
